title: diana lunar revel icon
body: omg i love daina so much but how can i get her icon. Am im too late. will it come back or is it in mystery gifts or hextech chest. someone plz tell me i really want to know {{champion:131}}

replies.body: I believe that these icons were limited and depended on the path that was chosen during the lunar event.  The icon isn't currently available, and unfortunately I don't have any details on upcoming events or content.  Stay updated at our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page in case anything comes up.    As an alternative, there is a lunar guardian icon that can be obtained.  I hope that helps!
